item.title: Best Open Earbuds, Tested and Reviewed (2025): Bose and More
item.description: These wireless earbuds with an “open” design let you zone out to your music while also keeping aware of your surroundings.

item.title: Try This Free Version of Microsoft Office That Runs in Your Browser
item.description: If you can't afford Microsoft’s $150 suite of office tools, there’s a web-based version that’s free to use—and nearly just as capable.

item.title: Own, a new social media app, aims to tokenize the creator economy
